_sText:
A large pool, already filled and a smaller pool that fills up when you press one of the taps.

Used a version of this in several maps, and i based it on a prefabe I have seen about a year ago.

You are able to use both pools at the same time, or use either of them, as the small is a seperate func_detail.

Don't redistribute, feel free to use it and edit it to your likings, but I'd love you if you'd gimme sum props. 

Filename: pool_evilelmo

The textures are rather boring, and i encourage you to sue custom textures to make it look less boring. 

/!\
make sure though, that you select EVERYTHING that u use the same texture on that touches other areas with the same texture (like for instance, the black and white tiles) with the "Texture Application Tool" and tag "treat as one" and then click "C" else the textures won't look as fluent.

 If you turn anything, use the "Texture application tool" on the face who's angles are affected by it, and in "Rotation" you type the degrees you turned it. Then you select the effected face, and every other face with the same texture that touches it (and all the faces with the texture that touch those etc) hit "Treat as one" and then hit "C"
/!\
